With my Telescope voucher ensuring Pluto's presence and my current Joker setup  DNA, Brainstorm, Steel Joker, Ride the Bus, and Blue Joker  I'm well-positioned to leverage this upgrade. DNA and Brainstorm are working well together to get steel non-face cards into play, a good strategy for scaling.

So, the best play is to select Pluto (position 1 in the pack) to directly level up the High Card hand.
